dream. design. develop.

You have a vision?

I can help you to bring it to your screen.

Build your brand. Have your website custom designed and coded. Spread the word across social media with a targeted marketing strategy. Keep your followers updated with blogs and newsletters.

Whatever you're looking for: Let's talk about getting your business online, and leave the rest to me - it's as easy as that!

How can I help you today?

Web Development

Web Development

Time to get your own little space on the web? Let's make it a perfect one! I'll bring your vision to the screen, from a static porfolio website like this one, to setting up a fullscale Wordpress Site like my travel blog.

Rate: from 300 € per project

Writing

Writing

In need of a copywriter? I have experience in writing compelling product and website copy, travel, technology and psychology related blogs, promotional ebooks and newsletters for a variety of clients, e.g. blog posts at hostelworld, scripting for Abraham Tours, writing a coaching blog and ebook for myself.today, speaking about travel technology at toomanyadapters, or creating this sales guide's content for HLITOA.

Rate: from 0,11 € per word

Digital Marketing

Digital Marketing

Having your own website is one thing, but how do you get people to actually see it? You'll need a thought-through marketing strategy and get personal with your audience. Brand recognition is the key. I can help you to kickstart this process, spark up the magic in your social media channels, and build and engage with your following. For example, I am marketing manager at myself.today and developed a social media stratey for HLITOA.

Rate: from 400 € per month

Coaching

Coaching

Becoming a location independent freelancer traveling the world full-time has been a long-lasting rollercoaster ride. Oh, it could have been so much easier... Visa and finance questions, working on the road, handling personal relationships - let me share my experience with you and guide you to becoming a successful digital nomad.

Rate: whatever you can afford - I know the start into remote life is tough :)

Photography

Photography

You want to get visual? Whether you are looking for licensed photos, or in need of a photographer for events, portraits and more, I can help you out! To get an impression of my work, scroll through my gallery.

Rate: in order to send you a proposal, just let me know what you need

Other

Other

Over the course of my freelancing years, I have participated in a variety of projects; I transcribed and translated, worked with children and managed teams, organized events, planned travel itineries, collaborated with tour operators, reviewed products and services, and much more. You can find out more on my LinkedIn profile.

If there is a task you'd like me to work on, please get in touch!

GET STARTED

Nice to meet you!

I'm Christina, a full-time digital nomad from Germany. I studied psychology, worked in marketing, human resources, research, and a lot more. Along my journey, I realized there are so many seemingly contradictory things I want to experience and learn...

This lead me to fusing my passions: Today, I am working as a freelance writer, digital marketer, web developer, photographer and more, traveling around the world with my mobile office - frankly, most of the time just praying for good internet connection.

Despite its challenges, this lifestyle and the freedom it entails makes me happier than ever - and I'm eager to keep growing personally, as well as to share the idea of a digital nomad life with others.

Let's get to business.
